doc:
Henry Daniell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Daniell 0 Charles Henry Daniell (5 March 1894 – 31 October 1963) was an English actor who had a long and prestigious career on stage as well as in films. He is perhaps best-known for his villainous roles in films like The Great Dictator, Philadelphia Story and The Sea Hawk. Daniell was given few opportunities to play a 'good guy', including a supporting part as Franz Liszt biographical film Song of Love (1947). His name is sometimes spelled "Daniel". Charles_Henry_Daniell ( 5_March_1894 – 31_October_1963 ) was an_English_actor who had a_long_and_prestigious_career on stage as_well_as in films . He is perhaps best-known for his_villainous_roles in films like The_Great_Dictator , Philadelphia_Story and The_Sea_Hawk . Daniell was_given few_opportunities to_play a_'_good_guy_' , including a_supporting_part as Franz_Liszt_biographical_film_Song of Love_(_1947_) . His_name is_sometimes_spelled "_Daniel_" .
